name: Acorn Hunt (fuscor, Vicente Murgui Sanchis)
description:
Recollect all the acorns you see and bring them to your burrow before time runs out. Don't stay on the ground for too long or the predators will hunt you.

Use WASD to move and SPACE to jump.

You can only collect 4 acorns at a time, go back to your burrow to store them.

Music by SubspaceAudio
